com.andrewreitz.spock.android.extension

Class WithContextExtension

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.andrewreitz.spock.android.extension.WithContextExtension

  • public class WithContextExtension
extends
    Extension for hooking into field annotations. This is used to add an interceptor to the setup fixture allowing for the context to be set.
    Since:
    1.1
